title: Road traffic counts from 2023 on Archer Lane and surrounding roads

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please send the raw data from the traffic counts carried out in 2023 for Archer Lane and feeder roads in the area.  I received an email from a member of your team in October saying these have been carried out.  This is in keeping with the process of cancelling this ATN and opening Archer Lane in Oct 2022.
Many thanks,
Christina Rhys

Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please could you tell me when my Freedoms of Info Request will be available?  It’s now long overdue. This is for ‘raw data’ of Road Traffic Counts from 2023 on Archer Lane and surrounding roads.
Many thanks,
Christina Rhys
